word: "And the glory which Thou gavest Me I have given them" (verse 22). The character that God gave Him, He has given us. "That they may be one, even as we are one: I in them, and Thou in Me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that Thou hast sent Me, and hast loved them, as Thou hast loved Me" (verse 22, 23).
